Description:
Centrally located near Ormond Station
Located within short walking distance to train stations, schools, supermarket and shops. This spacious 2 bedroom unit is on the first floor in a secured complex.
Features include lounge room, kitchen, bathroom and laundry.
Restaurants and all major fast food outlet is only minutes away. Security intercom system and car parking behind a remote controlled gate is also part of this package.
Ideal for the astute investor or first home buyers
From prompt response. Please call Andrew Lew 0418352468

Needs A Little Magic... Possibilities Are Endless...
Quaint 1920's cottage, on allotment 533 square metres approx. (General Res Zone - GRZ1)
An ideal prospect for a clever Re-development (Subject to Council Approval), a smart New Home or an enthusiastic Renovation.
Comprises: Livingroom, separate dining room, two bedrooms, original kitchen and bathroom, small 3rd bedroom or study.
McKinnon Secondary College zone. Bus, train and shops around the corner.

Description:
Zone in & corner the perfect park position!
Corner sited and stretched out on around 581sqm opposite beautiful Joyce Park, this GRZ2 & McKinnon Secondary College zoned pristine three bedroom, two bathroom brick beauty is ready to be appreciated for its substantial space, its perfect presentation and its parkside possibilities.
With welcoming & stunning established trees, elegantly accommodating with a fine formal lounge overlooking the park and a relaxed family zone oriented to north sun, this immaculate and cared for home is wonderfully livable as is with a sparkling modern kitchen, a spacious main spa bathroom and a park view master suite with two WIRs and a “secret” ensuite! This heated and cooled home needs just a little cosmetic update to maximise an ideal lifestyle in this prized parkside position.
Alternatively, capitalise on this blue chip corner with a substantial renovation and extension that captures the most of park views and the high amenity locale. Perhaps even start afresh and corner the prestige new home market or townhouse development living on this exceptional parkside land. STCA
Only minutes to North, McKinnon & Centre Rd shopping strips, cafes, bus routes & brand new stations.
Vicki Pollard : 0439 655 727

Description:
Quiet, Quality & In-Demand Location
Find style, space and modern grace in a block of five just off the strip! Oriented to catch sun in a private paved courtyard, this updated, north-facing 2-bedroom villa provides widespread living-dining on entry, newly renovated kitchen with stainless steel appliances, soft closing cabinetry and Caesarstone benchtops, spacious double bedrooms with built-in robes and a central bathroom with separate WC.
Featuring gas-heating and air-conditioning including a split system in the master, polished timber floors, a separate laundry, cable internet and a single lock up garage, this sensational start, sensible downsize or smart investment is in a location to love...just moments to Ormond's cosmopolitan restaurant, rail and retail precinct, 2 blocks to E.E Gunn Reserve, a stroll to Kilvington Grammar School and easy access to major roads for a City or Bayside commute. ALL ENQUIRIES MUST INCLUDE A CONTACT NUMBER.

Description:
Last One Available!
Quality Off-The-Plan Townhouses for Lifestyle Lovers
In this new boutique block of 7 exclusive townhouses, this stunning new flexible 2 bedroom (with potential for a 3rd bedroom) residence is sure to suit your needs. Thoughtfully designed with 2 bedrooms + study and 1.5 bathroom, these quality built homes feature north facing open plan living & dining (some with balcony), dynamic stone kitchen with quality European appliances, 2 spacious bedrooms (BIRs), fully tiled bathrooms, European laundries, landscaped courtyards and security basement parking with storage cage.
Flawless with its list of finishes, each residence features stylish timber floors, stone benchtops throughout, high ceilings, and the finest tapware. With construction to commence in 2017, youll get the best stamp duty savings possible if you purchase before building begins. Priced at under $750,000 you may also still be eligible for the government first home owners grant of $10,000.
So dont wait! And enjoy the convenience of Ormonds new train station, a great selection of shops, cafes, restaurants and night life in North Road, plus enjoy the easy access to two Monash University campuses, Caulfield Racecourse and leading schools.

Description:
Timeless beauty with a wonderful future
Such a charming home! Warm, welcoming and full of character this magnificently maintained and refurbished home combines classic elegance and relaxing comfort. Built c. 1923 when homes were constructed to last, the residence has a future that shines brightly. Set in beautiful gardens on land approx 700sqm the home has enormous kerb appeal and an interior that more than lives up to that promise. High ceilings, leadlight, strapped ceilings, picture rails, ceiling roses and handsome hardwood floors are highlighted by crisp white paintwork and perfect presentation. Off the wide central entrance hall is the sizeable living room with gas heater. Open to the dining area, the modern kitchen has Caesarstone benchtops, an appliance cupboard, pantry and ample storage. The master bedroom is huge and has mirror-fronted BIRs, while bedroom 2 also has a BIR and a built-in bookcase, and bedroom 3 has the luxury of an open fireplace. The bathroom has a flood of natural light via a skylight. An enormous timber rear verandah that is covered and has a ceiling fan and sunblinds overlooks the delightful, private, rear garden with bluestone-surrounded garden beds. A study/4th bedroom at the rear of the house, ducted heating, evaporative cooling, carport and a garage with automatic door are among the inclusions. The location is in walking distance to the brand new Ormond train station, buses, schools (incl Kilvington), shops and cafes, with the E Gunn reserve and Ormond tennis Centre at the end of the street and recreational facilities and parks nearby. As well as a 10 minute drive to Bentleigh (Centre Road) shopping, Chadstone shopping centre and Brighton beach.
Bruce Alcock : 0418 347 513

Description:
Tomorrow's Family Design at Today's Best Price!
1A now sold, 1B remaining
Ultra-accommodating, uber-adaptable and available for pre-purchase now, the latest project from internationally recognised architects, The Silver Arc and master builders, PMC Group, offers first-class family living in classic streetfront style. Due for completion April 2017, with the opportunity to secure maximum Stamp Duty savings now, this pair of streetfront homes offer highly flexible 4 bedroom, 3.5 bathroom floorplans with ensuite access for every bedroom, master-suites upstairs or down, expansive pergola-wrapped living-dining and a first-floor childrens' zone.
Set in private gardens with two carspaces including an auto-garage, each residence will be deluxe detailed with a Smeg appliance kitchen, thick CaesarStone benchtops, glossy Emporite cabinetry and wideboard European Oak floors. 6 Star Energy rated with LED lights and solar hot-water, these climate-controlled and alarmed homes will feature video-intercom, generous robes and great storage including WIRs.
In a leafy family location just around the corner from Packer Park with sought-after private and state schools close, the homes have the newly transformed Ormond rail and retail strip within 500m and the bus to Monash University almost at the end of the street. Offering tomorrow's architect-designed family living at today's best price, there's no time to play around ...secure your park-precinct home now!
NOTE: PHOTOS ARE FROM BUILDERS MOST RECENT PROJECT - 6A Paschal Street, Bentleigh

Description:
A Courtyard Sanctuary with Idyllic Potential
In this boutique group of 6, this private 2 bedroom ground floor security apartment has a surprising find.
Modernised at the start of the century with further scope to renovate, this inviting apartment enjoys a central hall introducing the timber floors, a bright light kitchen/meals with gas cooking, 2 double bedrooms (BIRs), a separate toilet and a radiant bathroom/laundry.
The surprise comes when you walk through the north facing living room onto a tiled patio and take the stepping stones around to a fabulously sized courtyard. With so much promise to make it really come alive, you?ll be happy with the comfort of a Rinnai gas heater, security intercom, ample storage, the lovely leafy aspects and undercover parking.
In this peaceful street, around the corner from the trendy new cafes and restaurants in North Road, an easy walk to the new train station, Monash University bus and delightful parks.

Description:
Shops, Stations, & a Prized School Zone Address!
Set to the rear on a compact block of just 2, this standalone brick home offers a rare and affordable opportunity to purchase at entry-level into a highly sought locale.
Breathe new life into the existing 3-bedroom home featuring a large lounge beyond a vibrant kitchen with breakfast bar, a separate WC for the bright bathroom and a maintenance free courtyard, and add value with a blue-chip renovation.
Alternatively, with the value added extras of a single garage plus carport, split system air-con, electric roller shutters, robes to all bedrooms and no body corporate, this sensational start, secluded scale down or seldom found investment is just moments to McKinnon Village and rail precinct, parks and schools, including in-zone McKinnon Secondary College. ALL ENQUIRIES MUST INCLUDE A CONTACT NUMBER.

Description:
Low Maintenance Entry, Lifestyle investment, Location to Love
This one ticks all the boxes. With sun, style and generous space, this substantial one-bedroom apartment is ideal for the first home buyer or investor. Already updated, the apartment features a new oven and gas cooktop for the large kitchen, built in robes for the big double bedroom, laundry facilities in the bright bathroom (separate WC) and a spacious living/dining area extending to a private tiled balcony for entertaining ease. Comprehensively appointed with authentic parquetry flooring, timber venetian blinds and ample cupboard, bench and storage space, secure entry and undercover off street parking. Set within a well maintained complex with leafy views and manicured gardens, this home is only minutes from Ormond's cosmopolitan rail and retail strip, parks and sporting grounds and an easy commute to schools and universities. ALL ENQUIRIES MUST INCLUDE A CONTACT NUMBER.

Description:
Captivating Californian in the College Zone
Rewrite history in Ormond's historic hill precinct. Set on a generous 702sqm approx. of prime McKinnon Secondary College Zone land, this c1922 Californian Bungalow comes with great accommodation, a deep backyard and something to inspire families, renovators and developers alike.
A fine example of the era with every period detail in place, this 4-bedroom, 2-bathroom home opens up with bay windowed formal dining, an open fireplace for the formal lounge and a woodfire warmed family zone against a beautifully detailed backdrop of rich timber panelling, high elaborate ceilings and stunning leadlight.
Centrally heated and reverse-cycle air-conditioned, this timeless family home comes with robes in every bedroom, a classic kitchen with meals, original hardwood floors and a carport beyond off street parking.
Even the gardens combine timeless beauty and family times with a cottage style entertaining retreat at the rear, a full width patio around a built in barbeque and a sparkling fully-fenced pool.
Enjoy the beauty that's already here, bring your renovation vision to this time-honoured classic or consider the 46.10m depth of this substantial block and meet the demand for low-maintenance family living with two new prestige homes (subject to council approval).
Close to Ormond's shopping strip and station, parks, schools and major roads for an easy commute to the city or sea. ALL ENQUIRIES MUST INCLUDE A CONTACT NUMBER.

Description:
All Set For Family Success
Set your sights on a stylish today whilst keeping options for tomorrow with this renovated three bedroom residence providing a versatile family start just a short walk from Caulfield South Primary, local shops and cafes and EE Gunn Reserve. Behind its charming 1930's facade, high Art Deco ceilings and spacious proportions highlight the character of its early beginnings before impressively renovated/extended spaces contribute modern family lifestyle functionality. Flexible sitting and fireside dining rooms, easily adaptable as additional bedrooms, partner two generous principle bedrooms that share a sleek contemporary bathroom with dual head shower and deep soaker bath. A central study offering built in storage precedes fabulous open plan family zones, a fully appointed modern kitchen with stainless steel benchtops and an undercover entertaining deck with views to the productive rear garden. Laundry with second shower and WC plus a separate loft style studio/ rumpus add further flexibility to a light filled family scenario complemented by glossy timber floors, ducted heating and reverse cycle cooling, attic storage, 10,000ltr water tank, gated off street parking and a brilliant oversized remote double garage/ storage. Land size: 650sqm approx.
PHOTO ID REQUIRED AT ALL INSPECTIONS
PLEASE NOTE: Open for Inspection Times and Property Availability is subject to change or cancellation without notice. Melway Ref 68D7

Description:
Spacious Style in Courtyard Serenity
Set at the back in this boutique group, this dynamic 1 bedroom ground floor security apartment breathes life into your lifestyle with its super spacious design and private courtyard garden. Freshly painted, this north facing retreat features an entry hall, relaxed living & dining area featuring a well-designed stone kitchen (Ariston appliances, pantry & microwave nook), generous bedroom (mirrored BIRs), chic bathroom with marble vanity and a European laundry.
A sunny terracotta terrace steps down to a tranquil leafy courtyard garden that?s in perfect privacy from the rest of the block, giving you your own place to enjoy summer barbecues or relax in the sun.
With security undercover parking, this premier first home or investment has R/C air conditioning, security intercom and slim line blinds.
On the fringe of everything Ormond ? excitingly close to the up and coming North Road eateries, bars and shopping precinct, the new Ormond station, Monash University bus and glorious parkland.

Description:
Relax, Entertain & Enjoy....
Effortless designer style and sophisticated presentation give this rear, ground-floor contemporary apartment a leading edge. In a striking development with the accent on relaxed urban living, the apartment has a large open-plan living room with sleek kitchen offering stainless steel appliances & dishwasher. The 2 double bedrooms have mirror-fronted built in robes and the courtyard provides great entertaining options all year round. Other inclusions such as lift access from the secure basement car park (with storage cage), intercom entry, split-system heating & cooling all add to the amenity and enhance the lifestyle on offer. The location is great, too - stroll to Ormond shops, cafes, businesses, trains and buses; enjoy nearby recreational facilities; be handy to schools and Monash Uni (Caulfield).
'Property being sold in conjunction with Tom Grieve from Ray White Carnegie'

Description:
Period Beauty, Divine Detail, Prized Location!
First class convenience, stunning period character and a rewarding school zone location are the hallmarks that place this prized Californian Bungalow in a class of its own.
With picturesque street presence and a wealth of period details, this stunning home on 563sqm approx. offers 3 robe-fitted bedrooms including a garden-view master, skylit dining beside a vibrant kitchen and a showpiece arched open fireplace in the fine formal lounge against a detailed backdrop of high elaborate ceilings, leadlight windows and pretty picture rails.
Then turn to the private, low maintenance gardens with lawn space for kids to play, a broad al fresco deck to entertain and a long tandem garage easily adaptable as a teen retreat.
With every convenience considered including ducted heating, stainless steel appliances, a euro laundry and Baltic pine floors, move right in and enjoy as is, upgrade kitchen and bathroom areas with a glamorous new look or turn to this wide and wonderful land and match the neighbours with a prestige home or townhouse development (subject to Council approval)
In-zone McKinnon Secondary College, Valkstone, Ormond and McKinnon Primary, this tightly held street is just metres to Joyce Park, moments to North Roads fast developing rail and retail hub and minutes to the Bay. ALL ENQUIRIES MUST INCLUDE A CONTACT NUMBER.

Description:
Blending old and new harmoniously
While the comfortable spaciousness and the handsome decorative features of the iconic Californian Bungalow have been maintained and enhanced in this inviting home, it has also been given a modern makeover that effortlessly brings together the old and the new. Baltic pine floors, lovely ornamental ceilings and cornices, and deep skirting boards are featured in the entrance hall - a fitting introduction to a well presented and lovely home. There is a formal lounge room as well as a natural light-filled open-plan informal living room with a kitchen where stainless steel appliances (including a 5-burner gas cooktop), rangehood and splashback add an urban edge to country-style cabinetry. It's a highly successful combination. The residence has 4 well-proportioned bedrooms (3 with BIRs; 1 with an OFP) and a study, plus 2 bathrooms - the first with a period ambience; the other contemporary style. Perfect for outdoor entertaining and children's play, the attractively landscaped, private rear garden includes a sail-covered, brick-paved BBQ area. Among the extras are ducted heating, evaporative cooling, several ceiling fans, sheds, and ample off-street car parking in front of and behind a gate. Set in attractively landscaped gardens, on an allotment of approx. 688sqm, this property is in a prized leafy street, on the bus route, close to reserves, sporting venues, recreation and cosmopolitan Koornang Road shops, cafes and trains, convenient to schools and with quick access to Chadstone and to Monash University (Clayton and Caulfield).
Benjamin Dax : 0408 560 790

Description:
A Single-Level Hideaway
Discover this single-level secret, discreetly hidden away right at the rear of a complex of six on the block. It's a savvy investment for your portfolio or great start to have as your own. You could also add your own style when the time is right and only if desired. It's not going to take much to bring it up to date either.
With a front courtyard and a second sail-covered alfresco area at the rear that's ideal for summertime barbeques, the neatly laid-out unit also features a generous living room open-planned to the kitchen with breakfast bar, two bedrooms with built-in robes, bathroom with shower-over-the-bath, separate laundry with space for storage, ducted evaporative cooling and a covered car space.
Within your reach, this affordable opportunity is also within easy reach of Ormond Station, buses for easy access to Monash University's Clayton campus, parkland and the shops and eating-out venues in North and Centre Roads and Glen Huntly Village.

Description:
Dual Zoning Delivers Developer's Dream
Boasting GRZ1 status allowing outstanding scope in the coveted McKinnon Secondary College zone, this 652m2 approx property offers exceptional redevelopment potential (STCA) in a picture perfect Ormond location abutting Jasper and North Rds. Surrounded by pristine period homes enjoying the undeniable convenience of shops, cafes and transport including Ormond Station close by, the original two bedroom dwelling currently comprises large lounge, central kitchen overlooking dining area and rear extension offering additional living zone opening to generous rear garden with large shed. The original home can now make way for the inspired reconstruction of luxury lifestyle residences or your new home in this tightly held and highly regarded precinct, where the possibilities are boundless, and the only limit is your imagination.

Description:
Super Spacious with Updated Comfort
Ideally designed for the astute investor, first homebuyer, young professional or downsizer, this spacious two bedroom, one bathroom, first floor apartment is in a location to love. Styled with timber-look floors, this quality apartment cleverly configured with multiple living zones offering an open lounge area blending effortlessly with stainless steel appliance kitchen and casual meals area, which flows out to a tree-top view balcony. With loads of space to add your own style, this light filled retreat features two generous bedrooms (one with BIRs), a classic white bathroom/laundry with separate toilet, designer-style textured carpets throughout and carport parking at rear. Enjoy a low maintenance, easy care lifestyle situated right on the edge of Ormond's cosmopolitan shopping strip. A lovely walk to cafes, restaurants and the train station with bus services to Monash University and Chadstone Shopping Centre close by.
Photo ID Required
